result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Chad W Myers

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Chad W Myers appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Chad W Myers.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah M Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.
Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar.  Any pretrial motions to be filed by the final pretrial date. 
Case adjourned to Branch 30.
Final pre-trial scheduled for January 13, 2023 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for February 1, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Chad W Myers appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Chad W Myers.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests additional time to review. 
Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 30.
This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Chad W Myers appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Chad W Myers.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Defense is in receipt of discovery and offer and requests time to review with client.
Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Chad W Myers
Current: 9801 W Oakwood Dr, Franklin, WI 53132 United States  (Effective: 08-17-2022)
Prior: 9801 West Oakwood Road, Franklin, WI 53132
Oral No Contact Order with The Rave.

Defendant Chad W Myers in court.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 30 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 08/17/2022@1:30p
